Description:
Our global systems integrators and advisory partners are vanguards on the path to break though innovation - and they are transforming their businesses with Microsoft! Learn how Microsoft is empowering our SI and advisory partners to accelerate frontier firm readiness for our Enterprise customers by driving AI transformation with agentic solutions and services.
